original_text: But thou shalt say unto them, This is a nation that obeyeth not the voice of the Lord their God, nor receiveth correction: truth is perished, and is cut off from their mouth.
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 말하기를 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 순종하지 아니하며 교훈을 받지 아니하는 민족이라 진실이 없어져 너희 입에서 끊어졌다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: But thou shalt say unto them
that obeyeth not the voice of the Lord their God
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들의 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 듣지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: and is cut off from their mouth
